definition: foreign devil/term of abuse for Westerners
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(derog.) wannabe foreigner, a Chinese person who apes the ways of foreigners
foreign devil/wartime term of abuse for Japanese

sentences.english: White people were pointed at in the street and called "foreign devil".
sentences.chinese: 白种人走在街上都会被指着骂“洋鬼子”。

definition: (derog.) wannabe foreigner, a Chinese person who apes the ways of foreigners
(Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing
devils/refers to 日本鬼子, wartime term insult for Japanese

lit. secondary foreigner/(derogatory term for Chinese Christians and others associated with foreigners, used at the time of the Boxer Rebellion)/(coll.) westernized Chinese person/(derog.) person of mixed Chinese and Russian blood/(slang) Ukraine/German shepherd dog/(dialect) two-year-old goat
to revere everything foreign and pander to overseas powers (idiom); blind worship of foreign goods and ideas
foreign religion (esp. Western Christianity in Qing China)
